bill.title: Military and Overseas Voters Act
bill.description: Enacts the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act to ensure ability of members of the military and others eligible voters who are overseas to participate in all elections for federal, state, and local offices. Authorizes ballots and balloting materials to be transmitted by facsimile or electronic mail. Makes conforming amendments. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to PBM, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 1
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by PBM on Thursday, 02-10-11 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on PBM recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Luke, Souki, Takai, Yamashita, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Saiki, Takumi.
(H) Reported from PBM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 225) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting no (0) and Cabanilla, Hashem excused (2).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-17-11 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Carroll, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, B. Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Morita.

(H) Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no and Carroll, Herkes, McKelvey excused.
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-24-11 10:45AM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Cullen, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Coffman.

(H) Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 107).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 04-04-11 9:00AM in conference room 016.
(S) The committee on JDL deferred the measure.
Carried over to 2012 Regular Session.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 02-02-12 9:30AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2450) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 03-06-12.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 39) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).

(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 758).
(H) House Conferee(s) discharged.

(H) Reconsideration of action taken on 03-08-12
